turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's urgent.

Oh hello there, I'm sorry but I don't quiteCan you tell me your name again and who you are please? Maybe if you slow down a bit?
I just want to make sure this is really you calling before we talk about anything important. Could you give me some time to check with someone else who knows more about these things? Perhaps I should call the IRS directly or something, huh?

It's okay Grandpa, I understand. It's Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We need to discuss an urgent matter regarding unpaid taxes. Can you please confirm your identity by telling me some recent information, like your full name and address? This is for verification purposes only. It's crucial we resolve this now to avoid serious legal consequences.

Oh dear, I see. Well, Thomas, before we proceed with anything private, could you give me a moment to think about this? Maybe I should speak directly with someone at the IRS that I know is official. Could you provide me with a phone number or website where I can verify everything first?
And maybe my wife, Carol, should be here too since she knows all our documents and we both like to double-check things when it comes to such serious matters.
What do you think about that?

Of course, Grandpa Walter. That's a smart idea to have your wife involved. For verification, you can call the official IRS hotline at 1-800-829-1040. But remember, time is of the essence here. The matter needs immediate attention to prevent legal action against you. Can I speak with Carol now or do you want us both to prepare and then you'll give her a call?

That sounds good, Thomas. Let me ask Carol to come over here first so we can talk together. We'll make that call to your official IRS hotline afterward to confirm everything is on the right track. Thanks for understanding, and I appreciate your patience while we verify this properly.

Absolutely, Grandpa Walter. Take your time and please call us back as soon as you're ready to proceed with Carol. We're here to help you settle this matter quickly and without any issues. Remember, the quicker we address it, the better for both of you. Speak to you shortly.
Thank you, Thomas. We will do that right away once Carol is here. Have a good day, and I'll be in touch soon.
You too, Grandpa Walter. Stay safe and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any assistance. We're just a call away. Take care.
Thanks, Thomas. You too. We'll get back to you shortly after talking with Carol and verifying through the official channels. Take care now.
Absolutely, Grandpa Walter. Looking forward to speaking with both of you soon. Have a good day.
You as well, Thomas. Speak to you later.
Talk to you soon, Grandpa Walter. Stay safe and take your time.
Thanks again, Thomas. We will. Take care now.
You too, Grandpa Walter. Have a good day.
Goodbye for now, Thomas. Stay well.
